website_summaries.verdict: The extra-wide lever on this punch makes putting holes in paper a little easier.
pros: Large handle helps you to punch through pages effortlessly
cons: The dies on this model are not adjustable

customer_reviews.title: Best 3-hole Punch Ever!
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best 3-hole punch I've ever owned! Hands down, the advertisement of this item does exactly what it says it will do. I can easily hole-punch 40 sheets without a struggle. You never have to adjust the line up of sheets of paper, as there is a stopper at the end to give your papers the same location of holes each and every time. If you are in the market to buy one, this is the one. You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Walker

customer_reviews.title: WOULD Be Great BUT
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this punches through paper with ease, and even better: it's easy to remove the 'dots'. HOWEVER: it has curved/beveled stop to push the paper against. this allows paper to slide about. (especially bad if paper is at all curled). The only workaround is to hold the paper down with your hand - tricky considering you also need to keep your hand out of the way. Really disappointing since it's otherwise an excellent hole punch.
customer_reviews.author: Grizelda

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I splurged on something durable. As a homeschooling mom I wore out my last 3-hole punch. Over the last 10 years I never needed to move the holes (in fact it was the adjustable hole part that broke) so the fact that these are stationary doesn't bother me a bit. I like that it locks in the closed position for storage purposes. The motion is smooth and it easily goes through many sheets of paper. It feels very durable and I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lumynara

customer_reviews.title: And consistent hole punch location due to paper guide
customer_reviews.text: Although this punch states that it’s capable of punching 40 pages at a time your likelihood that the punched holes are all in the same location on each page is highly unlikely. The paper gate that would normally keep your stack of pages square is actually slightly curved which means your papers are not going to lineup. The compartment that is supposed to capture and store the paper from the punched holes doesn’t close very well, resulting in the paper being able to fall out.
customer_reviews.author: C. of AAGS.

customer_reviews.title: Does The Hole Punch Job!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased new major kitchen appliances and had a multitude of owner manuals and installation booklets. Wanted to place them in a single reference 3 ring binder. Purchased this because of the number of sheets it was advertised to punch holes. Outstanding product that works great and with ease!! Performed better than expected and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: W. Graham Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have a class of 25 students and I can hole punch a whole class set of papers at one time. This saves a lot of preparation time. I wish I had bought this years ago instead of wasting time with the cheap ones. It looks sturdy, I hope it lasts for the rest of my teaching career.
customer_reviews.author: sherry922

customer_reviews.title: Defective - Bad Chip Tray Design!
customer_reviews.text: Returned first unit because plastic chip tray would not close flush with bottom of unit, preventing the hole punch’s rubber feet from contacting the desktop, causing it to slide around. Retuned it for identical unit, only to find same defect. Really????
customer_reviews.author: George Fordes

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says.
customer_reviews.text: Had a little trouble on my first attempt at punching through 40 sheets of paper. Couldn't get the punch down all the way and then the papers jammed. It cut cleanly through 20 sheets of paper and then when I tried again with 40 sheets, it did cut through but I had to apply more force. So it works, and I like that I can shut the lid and lock it. It's not very big so with the lid locked, I can easily tuck it away in a desk drawer and save space until I need it.
customer_reviews.author: wylona

customer_reviews.title: Good but doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: This worked good for a month and then the one rod (to punch the hole) shifted and it won't go down the "tunnel" to punch the paper -- so now we can't use it at all.
customer_reviews.author: J.Reas

customer_reviews.title: It broke after 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: The first stack of pages it worked GREAT!! I was happy. But after the second month of use (about 175 pages punched) the blade bent and it won't work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Steven R Thomas Jr

customer_reviews.title: Super Hole Punch!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect hole punch and is capable of handling large volume punch jobs. It is very sturdy and well made. The holes are punched equally from either end and align perfectly. With one punch, I have been able to go through more papers than my old punch could do in 4 or 5 punches. I love it, and the price is very reasonable also for this product. It also has a tray for the holes punched. Highly recommended! Wish I had it for the last 40 years.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Hard and can’t punch 40 pages thoroughly
customer_reviews.text: Kind of confusing at first, where you would normally punch holes is on the other side and I tried to punch 20 and it messed half my pages up (some got punched, some were punched with one or two or indented). But it’s still good for less than 20 pages
customer_reviews.author: Maryam

customer_reviews.title: Works great, good price
customer_reviews.text: This was a bargain and I'm happy with my purchase, but I have one minor gripe: There is a slight curvature to the metal where you line up the sheets. It feels like this could contribute to some uneveness. I wish it were a hard angle that wouldn't cause the paper to bend. It's a minor nitpick and hasn't been a problem. I handles 30+ sheets with easy.
customer_reviews.author: jsr

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: As a retired school teacher, I have always had hole punchers at home. My grandson needed to use it, borrowed it, so I gave it to him. I needed a new one, and this is a really nice, functional one.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: no adustment
customer_reviews.text: Gross overkill. My old one was smaller, adjustable and performed flawlessly until it broke. This one has a huge footprint and lacks an adjustment bar, but it is so robust, I fear that I will have to use it into the next millenium.
customer_reviews.author: douglas webb

customer_reviews.title: Injured my finger unlocking the hole puncher.
customer_reviews.text: The hole puncher has a lock/unlock feature so that it's more space efficient when it's not in use, including when it's in its original packaging. That's a fine concept in the abstract, but it unlocked so fast and with so much force that it caught my finger badly bruising it and cutting my skin. It's not a safe product.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty but arrived defective
customer_reviews.text: Bostitch is a great name in office products. The hole punch is heavy duty and substantial. The handle lock-down feature is convenient and functional for us. It really does punch through 40 sheets of light bond paper but for thicker material, definitely reduce the number of sheets being punched. It arrived missing a c-shaped lock washer on the end of the punch, but rather than go through the hassle of returning it and waiting for a replacement, we placed a piece of tape across the pin until a replacement washer could be obtained. It's a minor inconvenience for us but suggests a less-than-optimal inspection process on the manufacturers side.
customer_reviews.author: St. Louise Catholic Church

customer_reviews.title: Tray for hole punches does not work
customer_reviews.text: Just opened it and the tray that holds the popped holes is broken.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for home school use
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy product for an excellent price! I love that this is metal and not plastic. The Bostich name stands up to its reputation and comes witb a limited lifetime warranty. It easily locks in the down position for easy storage. It can truly do 40 sheets of regular weight paper quickly tackling my stack of papers to be hole punched for home schooling. The rubber grip on the bottom keeps it from sliding which came in handy when doing 40 sheets - I did have to stand to put enough pressure on the punch to go through its max capacity.
customer_reviews.author: AmyinKS

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: This product was what I was looking for and a previous customer wrote a rave review (which I also found incredibly funny) so I bought it thinking "cool, it's a 3-hole bunch. I'm sure it'll be fine" Nope. My life is forever changed for the better. No more wondering if you pushed the papers far back enough or if the holes will be half way off the paper. No more stress about having to hole punch a bunch of papers in small bits. THIS THING DOES IT ALL! Plus, I'm a teacher, and my students have not been able to destroy it yet! So yeah... this 3-hole punch is kind of legit.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Dominiak

customer_reviews.title: This is larger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: The 3-hole punch advertises 40 pages maximum, but I wouldn't do all 40 pages. I was putting together informational binders for my community project which were 200 pages per binder and in order to get the cleanest punch I would recommend 30 pages with this puncher. I purchased the puncher to assist me with the event due to the large number of advertised pages but in the end not too disappointed with the results as it is only a 10-page difference.
customer_reviews.author: It’s Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Smooth punch, but does NOT do 40 pages
customer_reviews.text: This is a smooth hole puncher, but no way does it so 40 sheets, unless you’re muscle man. 25 is the limit.
customer_reviews.author: T. Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Very user friendly and it's a beast
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hole puncher as I was tired of using poor quality hole punchers. I use quite a bit of paper and binders, so this sturdy beast not only looks amazing, but it works impeccably. The only criticism so far is that the tray that holds the paper punches isn't the most user friendly (you have to shake the whole thing to make them come out and do an awkward dance with it to empty it). It even has a locking mechanism so you can save some space (it is pretty big so that is useful). I haven't tested the 40 page capacity yet but I am sure it will come in handy pretty soon.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but...
customer_reviews.text: It does the job REALLY well; I love the confidence in precise positioning I get from the guides. Hence, 5 stars. But there is a proviso: Make sure that whoever uses it has Internet, because it does NOT come with instructions. In particular, the method that you use to clean it out (push the softer plastic ridged piece in front down an inch or so, and pour them out) is something that I would never have tried on my own, for fear of breaking it.
customer_reviews.author: Alchemist

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: A hole punch is a hole punch. WRONG. I had a smaller punch and the part that makes the hole started to "grab on" and not let go of the paper. Bought this one and love it! It's SOOO easy to use. I am able to punch multiple sheets of regular paper at the same time. Recently I was punching card stock. It could easily handle 4 sheets of card stock in a single punch. The mechanism is very smooth and with light pressure, it punched right through the card stock. I would HIGHLY recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Janice B.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: One of the three punches got hung up shortly after we got it. I was able to bend it out and fix it, but it only got two stars because of that. Something made of metal shouldn't break that easily, but its pot metal so I'm not surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Birkemeier

customer_reviews.title: BEST hole punch ever!!! Bostitch office supplies are GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the BEST hole punch I’ve ever used! I use it very frequently in my design firm, so it’s put to use and is still as great as it was when new! A little “industrial” looking, but the holes are always precise, easy to push the lever down, and is steady on the tabletop. The only con (which isn’t even a big deal) is the lock feature. If you even slightly tap it, or slide it in a cabinet, the lock pops to unlocked and the lever shoots up. Not a dealbreaker though! The best hole punch ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: It works marvelously!
customer_reviews.text: My new Bostitch 3-hole punch works marvelously! It really can punch up to 40 sheets of copy/typing paper and the broad handle makes it easy to press down to punch. It has a sturdy metal frame, and the locking handle mechanism makes it easy to store in drawers or other tight places. The hole-scraps compartment is opened and closed via a front flap. I recommend this product with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: A Romero

customer_reviews.title: A good quality hole punch
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a good quality 3 hole punch that can punch a decent amount of paper at one time. I've had smaller ones that only punch a few sheets at a time and this is so much easier and does not clog from the paper punched out.
customer_reviews.author: KenHendSF

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Punches holes up with 40-50 piece of paper, the only down fall is having to empty it... that piece of plastic is hard to open and impossible to close. It looks like it wasn’t made to ever be open and empty. Either way, tape it back and yeah, it get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: Now THAT’S a hole puncher!
customer_reviews.text: Great hole punch. Had to retire my old 3 hole punch and man was this an UPGRADE!! Super easy to use (kinda surprised actually). My first time trying it I hole punches like 20-30 sheets and it sliced the holes “like butter”. Very nice hole punch!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: It was sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I needed something sturdy to punch through small magazines I was putting in a binder. This punch did the job. The only thing that was a little awkward to use was the disposal method of disposing of the holes punched out.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Love this puncher
customer_reviews.text: I love this hole puncher. You cannot change the location of the punchers from the typical page size (9.5 x 11) but this is EXACTLY what I needed. I am a teacher and my students would sometimes move the punchers on my old one so that nothing would ever get punched correctly. I've used it with large stacks of paper without any issues. It is easy to press and has not clogged as of this point after constant use over a month. Definitely worth the price! thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Bay

customer_reviews.title: Poor design.  Terrible quality control.
customer_reviews.text: Poorly designed. The plastic press-on base plate is warped and does not sit on a table without a bit of a wobble. Placing paper correctly is difficult because the alignment ridges are curved and allow the paper to slide around. About a quarter of the time I use it, I have to clean up the hanging punches (does okay with thicker bundles of paper, but usually messes up when only punching one or two sheets). Returning it for money back. Bostitch used to be a good solid brand. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item not expecting a lot because of the price. This is sturdy and worked exactly as promised. I recommend adding this to your home office! Seller shipped immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Espana

customer_reviews.title: The quide is not adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: The fact that the guide is not adjustable should be in the description. Saying the guid is integrated doesn't apparently mean that the guide is adjustable. I need to be able to punch many pages and include in a standardly punched. document. So if you only want it for documents that you will punch then you are ok. But if you have to insert pages somewhere it will be a pain. I will have to return this.
customer_reviews.author: sharryberry

customer_reviews.title: I finally landed a sturdy 3 hole punch
customer_reviews.text: punches ALOT of papers at a time. I finally landed a sturdy 3 hole punch. I love how I can tuck it away when I don't need it. It has a pin that holds the handle down so it doesn't take up an absurd amount of room like a lot of 3 hole punch do.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great capacity/quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this 3-hole punch. I got it for school so I could get my huge packs of papers that I have to print into binders. I couldn't find anything like it/with that much capacity at the store. I really hate when I have to punch small packs of papers multiple times then the holes don't line up and then they fall out of the binder and such. This one has worked great for 3 months and does what it says it does.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great to use!
customer_reviews.text: I had lost a older three hold punch similar to this but was holding out to find it! What was I waiting for???? I should have just purchased this years ago! It is easy to use, works well with many sheets and I like that fact that you can lock the handle so it's not quite as large. I'm even considering purchasing a second one! I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Wife&momto5

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: This gets a lot of use in my office and I am well pleased. I bought it on the strength of the reviews, versus just getting the same one that I bought on Amazon 4 or 5 years ago. This feels stronger so I suspect it will come home with me when I retire in 5 years! The ability to lock it down so you can stack it if necessary is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: janelizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great for your home office
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement to an older hole punch now that Covid has everyone working at home. I like that this can punch through 40 sheets of paper because I have a high volume of printing that I do and having to only punch a few at a time gets annoying. In fact, I already put this thing through its paces at big and got through about 45 to 50 sheets of paper with a little effort, but 40 an under it breezes right through. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Easy to use. Lock feature is great. I noticed that if I have more than 10 pages that they go above the wall that’s designed to line everything up which can cause my papers to be misaligned if I don’t manually adjust them. Doesn’t bother me because I don’t hole punch a lot of papers at once and don’t mind taking 10 at a time.
customer_reviews.author: BillieL

customer_reviews.title: Handles more sheets at a time than a hotel maid
customer_reviews.text: As a teacher, I used this thing a lot... Before Covid19 stole me away from my classroom. Back then, in the good old days, this 3-hole punch made my life a lot easier when I forgot to push the right buttons on the copy machine (which happened often). I used to slap my forehead in frustration, but after buying this, I directed my palms instead to the lever of this heavy duty three-hole punch and was able to forgo many a headache. I give this review in tribute and gratitude.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Lee

customer_reviews.title: You MUST Buy This
customer_reviews.text: This 3-Hole Punch is a work horse. I've been coordinating a large project at work and have probably punched 10,000 pages since early November. This punch handles 40 pages at a time with ease and keeps on working. It's easy to push down even with so much paper to push through and, also, it's catch bin for the little paper punchouts is easy to clean and has never let them spill out over my desktop. I've actually had to keep it locked away because colleagues have been eyeing it greedily. As I've been telling them, you must get your own!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have used the usual run of the mill hole punches for years. We moved and mine was lost. I decided to get a really solid one that can punch holes in a lot of papers at a time. It works so incredibly well! It makes me regret not getting this years ago since I would have saved a lot of hours of tedious punching. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Adamo

customer_reviews.title: Better to have & not need, then need & not have!
customer_reviews.text: Killing it every week with this bad boy. 6th grade Sci & Math Teacher, talk about commercial use. It’s on my desk I use it one st a time and it’s max 40 at a time. Perfect holes every time. Once past 20 or more at one time you will have to get serious with it. And max it out and you’ll need to slam it. I’m 6’2” 250lbs and have put this thing to the test - stellar no worries. Get this one and finesse it or beat it either way it will survive and your holes will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: D. GILBERTTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Never did I think I'd spend time reviewing a 3 hole punch....10+ stars!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, this thing punches through paper, plastic, whatever, with relative ease. Needed something large for grad school since I'm printing 40+ page docs on the regular now, and this saves me so much time and headaches. It folds down and locks so you can just slip it somewhere inconspicuous until you need it. Great for home or office. Seriously, this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Kate P.

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't normally give a review on a product like this, however this product is absolutely great
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't normally give a review on a product like this, however this product is absolutely great! It can handle many pages at once, it has a knob that holds the arm down so I can pack things on top of it in closet, and while it catches the bits of paper, it also has a piece that simply pulls back to allow you to empty contents in garbage. Compact, neat and convenient -- my kind of product!!
customer_reviews.author: jaberty

customer_reviews.title: Best 3-Hole Punch ever!
customer_reviews.text: I'll confess that I didn't know I could have such an affinity for a 3-hole punch! But this is far and away the sturdiest and most efficient one I've ever used. I was an administrative assistant for 20 years, and struggled daily with the smaller, cheaper 3-hole punches. f I had known then that this kind of 3-hole punch existed, I would have quickly bought one "out of pocket" and made life much easier! It's well worth the money, for office or home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Part holding the punches is poorly made and leaks punches all over the place!
customer_reviews.text: Someone else posted this, I wish I had paid closer attention. The flap to empty the punches is poorly constructed. This thing leaks punches all over the place. I wish I had purchased something else. Look at the pictures in the reviews, you can see what I am talking about.
customer_reviews.author: Familyofsix

customer_reviews.title: This is just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This product should get a better overall rating. I needed something that would punch through a lot of sheets each time, to save me time and annoyance. It also had to line up right each time. This does it. I'm happy. End of story.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: Super solid. I've been using this to punch through 7-10mil clear plastic report covers for face shields. I can do about 15 at a time without any problems. My only complaint is that I have to remove the bottom in order to center the plastic covers. Other than that, this thing is stout.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mac.

customer_reviews.title: Very substantial hole punch
customer_reviews.text: I'm a high school teacher and my son is a pharmacy major so we both have our share of paper work that gets punched and organized in binders. We went through a couple crappy hole punches and decided to buy one that would last us to retirement and graduation. This is the one. It can easily handle a hefty stack of papers at a time without catching and sticking like most paper punches do.
customer_reviews.author: brooksj

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I like this hole puncher and should have bought it long ago. The old one we have is very hard to use. This one is like night and day. Punches many papers at one time. Very good product and I highly recommend this to anyone who is shopping for one. This is the one you want. It works very good.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Oily upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use product, however there is an oily like substance on both ends of the metal prongs that punch holes into the paper. After punching my first set of documents, all of them got oil/grease on the rings. I had to clean up the oil on the top and after several punches the grease marks have gone away. Other than that, the product itself works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and sturdy product.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is indestructible. I teach 75 teenage boys and they haven't been able to kill it yet, which says a lot!
customer_reviews.author: reviewer1221

customer_reviews.title: INCOMPLETE DESCRIPTION
customer_reviews.text: IT MIGHT HAVE BEEN NICE TO BE ADVISED THAT THE HOLE PUNCH NEEDS TO BE USED WITH DISCARD PAPER FOR SOME TIME TO GET THE OIL OUT OF THE PUNCH!!! RUINED QUITE A FEW DOCUMENTS DUE TO THE OIL COMING OUT OF THE PUNCH AND SPREADING OVER THE PAPERS AROUND THE HOLES. GEEZ...IS THAT SO DIFFICULT TO PUT THAT NOTICE IN WITH THE UNIT?????
customer_reviews.author: Performance Coach

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and no snags
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for making COVID-19 face shields. My previous desktop hole punch didn’t even handle one sheet of the transparencies I used. With this I was doing at least 10 sheets without issue and got the job done in no time. No snags and it feels rock solid.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch G

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this 3 hole punch. Honestly, it is a small thing in the big scheme of life... but for me, it makes such a difference being able to quickly and smoothly punch through a thick stack of papers. I work full time, am a student working on my M.Div., teach a class at my church and serve on various committees. I use binders to keep papers organized. I highly recommend this 3 hole punch.
customer_reviews.author: Gray

customer_reviews.title: Not a new product.
customer_reviews.text: We received this and it is clearly used. I thought I was buying a new product. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Laura I Kebker

customer_reviews.title: Teacher's best friend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hole punch! Just a few weeks into teaching, my cheap three-hole-punch broke. I decided to spend a little more money this time and got this baby. I like that it can be locked to take up less space and I LOVE that it can punch through so many sheets! This is great for punching through class sets or big packets without much effort. I anticipate this lasting many more years with no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Now I know what I’ve been missing!!
customer_reviews.text: I would this 100 stars if I could. Exceptionally well made and sturdy. So easy to use. LIVE the locking feature which makes it easier to store. Use it multiple times a day in my classroom. Easily cuts through multiple laminated sheets of card stock. Makes my life so much easier and such a great time-saver! Worth every penny. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Avon EMB

customer_reviews.title: Product is poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: Product is cheap. When I received it was not working. Unfortunately I was scheduled for hip replacement surgery. Did not have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Aldrene Duvaul

customer_reviews.title: Good heavy quality
customer_reviews.text: Great hole punch. Cuts through my 20+ pages very easily (my 8 year old can do it). I only gave it 4 stars because mine somehow doesn’t have a middle punch?? Sending it back to get a replacement and hopefully that will punch all three holes.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bek

customer_reviews.title: Great paper hole punch
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for the office where I work. Everyone loved it so much I ended up buying another one. It's very sturdy oh, it does have a locking feature which but honestly I don't think it needs but it does do a great job
customer_reviews.author: Janee

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This hole punch makes putting student binders together so much faster, it says it will hole punch 40 sheets but it will do a few more than that. I was even able to get it to hole punch through a student workbook with 60 plus pages buy punching one side then flipping it to the other.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Nice, heavy, durable hole punch
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice durable hole punch for desktop use. I use it for realtor papers to hand to my clients to put in their folders when looking at homes. It locks nice to not stand up so high when not in use and is handy, and quick to use. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Snoozer31

customer_reviews.title: Very easy on the hands
customer_reviews.text: I really like this 3 hole punch. It is very easy on the hands when placing large amounts of paper to hole-punch. For the price it is sturdy and well worth it. The only item that would be better would be automated but this price was very reasonable for the amount of times I will be using it.
customer_reviews.author: rottielove

customer_reviews.title: Lock Feature Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be sturdy and it can punch through a lot of pages at once. It's definitely not a bad hole punch. However, I am really disappointed in the design of the lock feature. The lock is only held in place by the pressure of the handle trying to lift itself. This means that if you put the hole punch in a bag, or store it in any way that would push on the handle, the lock doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Thurston

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to its name of EZ Squeeze
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this really IS easy to use - It almost feels like it is powered. I'm not a weakling by any means, but it's really satisfying to use because it feels almost effortless. Hole alignment is totally accurate as well. I also like the fact that you can lock the handle in the down position. (But be careful with this - I slightly pinched a finger when unlocking it the first time.)
customer_reviews.author: J. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Finally A Good 3-Hole Punch
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been waiting to get one of these for a while. I have a smaller 3-hole punch but I needed a bigger one for unit studies. I homeschool my kiddos and needed something to make less work for me. I found it here lol Definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: jmb

customer_reviews.title: Solidly used by 4 teachers and ~100 students for full school year
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't punch holes without this bad boy. I use this daily for all my handouts, and 3 other teachers in my hallway frequently visit me to use it. Even my students use it to punch holes in papers from other classes. Sturdy and consistent. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: VWA

customer_reviews.title: Handles quite a large stack
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about 40 sheets, but I did punch 25 at a time in regular printer paper and it felt reasonably confident doing it. The self-storing lock is very nice. Assuming that the plastic chad dump cover on the base doesn't become brittle with age, this should last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Akom

customer_reviews.title: Good for the classroom
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my classroom and love it. I sometimes allow students to make hole punches for me and I’m not scared to let them use this hole punch. They know not to use too many papers (I tell them 15) but this can do about 30 without having problems.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Vally

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed this hole puncher to put together binders for calendars, schedules, test & text answer keys for my daughter’s homeschool curriculum. I am more than pleased with this product!! It is able to punch through quite a thick stack of paper with no trouble at all!! There are guided edges to ensure a perfect punch & I love how it locks down for easier storage! It is a heavy duty item! You can’t go wrong on this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: SAVES TIME
customer_reviews.text: I have 30 - 60 6th grade students so hole-punching can take some time. I finally gave in and researched and ended up purchasing this one. Can I say AMAZING! I can hole punch a whole stack of papers and that makes my life easier. Thanks for thinking of us "teachers" and making this affordable!
customer_reviews.author: fannwell

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: For 10 years I struggled with one of those 3 hole punches that only does 2 pages at a time. I finally got fed up and decided to order a new one. I selected this one based on the reviews. No adjustment needed, straight out of the box it worked as expected. So easy, no frustration, it just punches holes in multiple sheets ata a time. I can't believe I waited so long.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: A office need
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and punches through 40 sheets of paper with ease
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: easy to use. value,
customer_reviews.text: arthritis who? this is easy to use for sure. its like butter. i have bad wrists and i couldn't believe how easy this was for me to use. i use it for scrapbooking and it goes through thick paper just as easy as lined paper. what a value. ud pay way more at a store.
customer_reviews.author: suzie

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: I had a hole punch that would only do up to 10 pieces of paper at a time. I needed something that would do more and the reviews for this punch looked very good. It lives up to all the good things said about it. It is solidly made and feels very durable. The upper part can be locked down for better storage. It is a great product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Effortless and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Strong and super easy to use. As a student I need to hole punch a lot and the most irritating thing was when the hole puncher jammed because I used too many papers. So, I caved and bought this and it’s lasted me 3 years still looking in top condition and cutting sheets effortlessly
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Works great, quality product
customer_reviews.text: Love this whole puncher. This one was much better quality than I could find at the store, and it’s really heavy duty. I don’t have any problem going through 10 or 15 pages of paper with this.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt Wichman

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of paperwork and needed a good paper punch. This Bostitch EZ Squeeze is everything that it says it is. I love this whole punch. I am an older person and my dexterity is not what it used to be. This pushed down easily through 30-40 sheets of paper. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: D C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hold punch
customer_reviews.text: I teach middle school, and this thing is a BEAST. Smooth like butter through 25 or 30 sheets, needs some muscle to do 40. The lock is a nice feature to take up less space, and to keep students from using it without permission.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Quality 3 hole punch
customer_reviews.text: This hole puncher can cut through many pieces of paper without hurting your hands when pressing down. I like that I can lock it and my toddlers cannot get their fingers caught in it. Also very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Quinn Porter

customer_reviews.title: A pleasure to use
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling with one of the cheapie punches which take at most five sheets and usually end up with unaligned punches. This punch can take a real stack of papers and make a clean punch every time. It seems to be a study, well-built item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I use it to 3 hole punch downloaded graph , notebook , and free school templates for my 8 year old. It is more cost effective to buy ink on amazon , paper at costco and print my own as needed.
customer_reviews.author: doodaa

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I have had many hole punchers but this thing is amazing and it saves me so much time. I no longer have to seperate my papers and only do a couple at a time. This thing can definitely handle 40 sheets with no problems! I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: What A Time Saver
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a small 3 hole punch, but needed something to handle 15 sheets at a time, and the Bostitch EZ Squeeze seemed like the best bet. It is just what I needed to easily and accurately punch through the stack with one easy squeeze. In addition, it is rugged and economical.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Works- no complaints!
customer_reviews.text: I counted out 40 pages to see if it works. It does. It is difficult to push down, but seriously, it's 40 pages, it's going to be difficult. It has been knocked around and abused, so far, it has survived! I like the page line up feature, and the lock feature. If it breaks, I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I needed a 3-hole punch that would punch a lot of pages and this one definitely does! It locks/unlocks easily and is really easy to use. The only thing missing is an adjustment to where the holes punch, but for standard use, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy, quiet.  Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love this punch. Takes care of multiple papers at a time with ease. Super sturdy, easy lock mechanism, and quiet when in use. Will buy again when need comes to replace others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Teacher gives it a gold star. Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and I love this! I can punch holes in at least 25 papers at a time without any trouble at all. That is super important when you just made packets for your students that are 17 pages each...and you have over a hundred students.
customer_reviews.author: FrugalSuperMommy

customer_reviews.title: Like others say: Fantastic hole punch!
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, the best hole punch I've seen - except I wish you could adjust it to accommodate Day-planner type paper, which is usually smaller and has 5 holes. Perhaps they made one also for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff4U

customer_reviews.title: It was a breeze to do the huge job I was working on
customer_reviews.text: It was a breeze to do the huge job I was working on (40 sheets was too much but 20-25 seemed okay) - no strain to work the punch even with my fibromyalgia! The only real problem is trying to empty the tray. There is a very funky piece of plastic that looks like it would break if you open it too wide and then I had to shake and shake to try to get the little hole punches out. No instructions came with it and nothing on line - I thought maybe I wasn't doing something right.
customer_reviews.author: DeEtta L.

customer_reviews.title: Great hole punch
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. Had an old one that could only do 10 sheets but usually only handled 5 or 6 and was pretty difficult to punch. This one is awesome. I have yet to have a document that I needed to punch multiple times to get all the pages punched. Best of all it is not difficult.
customer_reviews.author: b839549

customer_reviews.title: Hole punch works like predicted online
customer_reviews.text: I have a bunch of papers that usually stapled together to punch. It would be difficult to restaple the papers again due to the amount that I am punching. This hole puncher has worked as it was described. It has made hole punching easy.
customer_reviews.author: Abet

customer_reviews.title: It's a HEAVY duty hole puncher
customer_reviews.text: I am a medical consultant and have to put together presentation reports, analysis reports, operations manuals, training modules and I need a clean, sharp, consistent punch every time. This product definitely delivers.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M. AzulayTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Stop your search
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great 3 hole punch. I can put packets of papers, and it will chop through like butter. It is so smooth and easy to use. There's no need to put any weight on to make sure it has sliced. The lock is easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Kyleigh Bloyd

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy office tool
customer_reviews.text: Reliable, must have in your office. Works as intended and ergonomic. I would be using it work a long time as it is very sturdy and makes my work easier and faster to accomplish. I would recommend it to any office worker as it is my 3rd one and it is a present to a co-worker.
customer_reviews.author: AndreyA

product_meta.title: Bostitch EZ Squeeze 40 Sheet 3-Hole Punch (HP40)
product_meta.description: Size:Original versionComfortably and easily slice through stacks of paper with 50% less effort using EZ Squeeze technology. With an all-metal design and a wide handle for maximized comfort, confidently three-hole punch up to 40 sheets of paper with 50% less force than comparable punches. Ensure professional, consistent 3-hole placement using the built-in paper guide. The easy-to-clean chip tray maintains a tidy environment while the rubber base of the paper punch provides extra stability and protects your desktop during heavy use. With a versatile range of 1 sheet to 40 sheets, this punch works for light duty to heavy duty use. Great for work, school, or the home office. Standard three hole configuration with 9/32” diameter holes.
feature_bullets: EZ Squeeze technology requires 50% less force during use
All-metal design for superior, 40-sheet punch performance
Handle locks down for compact storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.9 out of 5 stars2,732 ratings4.9 out of 5 stars
